sentences.sContent: She received an eight-year prison sentence.
He has just begun a life sentence for murder.
sentences.sCn: 他犯了谋杀罪，刚开始服无期徒刑。

sentences.sContent: Sanchez was sentenced to three years in prison.
sentences.sCn: 桑切斯被判了三年监禁。

sentences.sContent: ...And he always starts his sentence by saying...

trans.tranOther: a punishment that a judge gives to someone who is guilty of a crime
if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment
